title: ServiceRoot.0.91.0
description: This object represents the root Redfish service.
specification: This object represents the root Redfish service.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification at <url>.  Copyright (c) 2013, Avocent & Hewlett-Packard.  All rights reserved.

Time.description: The current time as reported by the owner of this Redfish Service
Time.specification: The value of this string shall represent the time of the Redfish service.  The format of this string shall will be in the ISO 8601 extended format as follows: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSS'Z'

ServiceVersion.description: The version of the Redfish service
ServiceVersion.specification: The value of this string shall represent the version of the Redfish service.  The format of this string shall be of the format majorversion.minorversion.errata in compliance with Protocol Version section of the Redfish specification published at <url>

UUID.description: Unique identifier for a service instance.  This value should be an exact match of the UUID value returned in a 200OK from an SSDP M-SEARCH request during discovery.
UUID.specification: The value of this string shall represent the id of the Redfish service instance.  The format of this string shall be a 32-byte value in the form 8-4-4-4-12.  This value shall be an exact match of the UUID value returned in a 200OK from an SSDP M-SEARCH request during discovery.

links.description: The links object shall be all of and the only references to other resources.

Systems.description: This is a link to a collection of Systems.
Systems.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Systems schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Systems'.

Chassis.description: This is a link to a collection of Chassis.
Chassis.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Chassis schema. The last segment of the path shall be 'Chassis'

Managers.description: This is a link to a collection of Managers.
Managers.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Managers schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Managers'

Tasks.description: This is a link to the Task Service.
Tasks.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the TaskService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Tasks'

AccountService.description: This is a link to the Account Service.
AccountService.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the AccountService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'AccountService'

Sessions.description: This is a link to the collection of Sessions.
Sessions.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Sessions schema.    The last segment of the path shall be 'Sessions'

EventService.description: This is a link to the EventService.
EventService.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the EventService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'EventService'

Schemas.description: This is a link to a collection of SchemaFiles.
Schemas.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the SchemaFile schema where the files are JSON Schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Schemas'

Registries.description: This is a link to a collection of Registries.
Registries.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the SchemaFile schema where the files are Registries.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Registries'

copyright: Copyright 2013-2014 Avocent Corporation. Copyright 2014 Dell Inc. Copyright 2013-2014 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P. Copyright 2014 Intel Corporation.
